      • getResizedImageData

        public byte[] getResizedImageData(int widthLimit,
                         int heightLimit,
                         int byteLimit,
                         boolean square)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the bytes for this UriImage. If the uri for the image is remote, then this code must not be run on the main thread.

        java.io.IOException
